definition: to add/to attach/to be close to/to be attached

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要给空容器加压，不要放在明火或热源附近。

sentences.english: Why should cattle not graze near yew trees?
sentences.chinese: 为什么牛不在紫杉附近吃草？

sentences.english: I was having lunch with Galt at a French restaurant near her apartment in Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 我们在高特切尔西区公寓附近的法国餐馆吃饭。

sentences.english: In the arms of a suspect was arrested near the burial.
sentences.chinese: 一可疑人物在武器埋藏地附近被逮捕。

sentences.english: You can have a lot of fun for cheap close to campus.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在校园附近玩得很开心，而且花钱也不多。

sentences.english: The brawl in the street could be heard in the house nearby .
sentences.chinese: 在附近的房子里都能听到街上的争吵声。

sentences.english: This color composite view was recorded under dark skies near Sydney, Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这张彩色合成影像是在澳洲的雪梨附近所拍摄。

sentences.english: The Maldives comprises the equator and has a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 马尔代夫位于赤道附近，属热带气候。

sentences.english: Each one set of pilot ladder near port and starboard of the main deck shall be provided.
sentences.chinese: 主甲板的左右舷附近各安装一个引水员软梯。

sentences.english: Is here a bus stop near by?
sentences.chinese: 我想问问附近有没有公车站？

sentences.english: When it occurs in the back near the spinal cord or the nerve roots, it can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 如果正好发生在脊椎或神经附近的话会非常痛苦。

sentences.english: Leon Trotsky was assassinated near Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 托洛斯基在墨西哥城附近遇刺。

sentences.english: The envelope must be on a trail somewhere around Tillicum Village.
sentences.chinese: 信封一定就在提利坎姆村附近的一条小路上。

sentences.english: A massive sculpture of the seated Buddha rests in the yellowish sandstone cliffs at Single Pebble Village(Danzishizhen) just east of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 大佛坐落于重庆东部弹子石镇附近一处黄砂岩悬崖上。

sentences.english: There’re quite a few shops and galleries near your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在你住的饭店附近有几家商店和艺术馆。

sentences.english: It happened to be in the Washington, D.C., suburbs, near my home.
sentences.chinese: 店址选在首都华盛顿市郊，恰在我家附近。

definition: one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
